description:
Keeping your ride looking like new doesn't have to take hours every day. The Bio Bike Wash from WPL is a safe and powerful all-purpose bike cleaner that makes the cleaning easy. This biodegradable formula is tough on dirt, but kind on the people that use it. 100% VOC-free, phosphate-free and non-corrosive, this cleaner lets you ride longer and spend less time cleaning up.

  • Surface-active compounds cuts through dirt and contaminants
  • Cleaning requires minimal effort
  • Eco-friendly formula is 100% biodegradable, VOC-free and phosphate-free
  • All-purpose cleaner for all bicycle parts and frames, including carbon
  • Safe on seals, anodized metals, disc rotors and brake pads
name: WPL Bio Bike Wash 946ml
